projects.title: MLPClassifier
projects.description: Multi-layer Perceptron (MLP) is a supervised learning algorithm that learns a function by training on a dataset. This model has 700 hidden layers. MLPClassifier has an accuracy of 98.29%

projects.title: Kneighbor
projects.description: Classification is computed from a simple majority vote of the 2 nearest neighbors of each point: a query point is assigned the data class which has the most representatives within the nearest neighbors of the point. KNeighbors has an accuracy of 93.36%

projects.title: Decision Tree
projects.description: Decision Trees create a model that predicts if a message is spam by learning simple decision rules inferred from the data. DecisionTreeClassifier has an accuracy of 95.96%

projects.title: Random Forest
projects.description: 20 Trees are formed from a sample drawn with replacement from the training set. RandomForestClassifier has an accuracy of 97.04%
